articles.title: Samsung’s Exynos 2500 Heavily Disappoints In New Single-Core & Multi-Core Leak, With Its 10-Core CPU Cluster Unable To Beat Top-End Chipsets From Qualcomm, MediaTek And Apple - Wccftech
articles.description: A new benchmark leak showcasing the Exynos 2500 is as disappointing as ever, with Samsung’s flagship SoC obtaining lower scores
articles.content: The Galaxy S25 launching exclusively with the Snapdragon 8 Elite hinted that Samsung was once again experiencing untold troubles with its Exynos 2500, which was supposed to debut with the companys fl… [+2258 chars]
